game

Class CompoundMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap
      • game.CompoundMap

  • public class CompoundMap
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap
    Author:
    Sravan A subclass of GameMap that handles the spawning and removal of Mambo Marie from the game map. Keeps track if Mambo Marie has been killed by the Player.

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Spawns Mambo Marie 5% of the time, if she is still alive and is not on the map. Removes Mambo Marie 30 turns after she spawns. Checks if Mambo Marie has been killed by the Player
        Overrides:
        tick in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap
